titleStmt.title: By the King. The care of the Kings of this realme our progenitors, for the restraint of exportation of gold and siluer into forraine parts
Proclamations. 1611-11-23
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
Dated at end: Giuen at Newmarket the three and twentieth day of Nouember, in the ninth yeere of our reigne ... .
Arms 11; Steele notation: Progeni- which 2) to 3) in by.
Reproduction of original in the British Library, London, England.
